## Definitions 

-   Population, sample
-   Parameter, statistic
-   Null and alternative hypotheses
-   Type I and Type II error rates
-   P-values

## General form of confidence interval

-   statistic $\pm$ t or z $\times$ s.e.(statistic)
    -   $\bar{X} \pm t(1-\alpha/2; n-1) \frac{S}{\sqrt{n}}$

## General form of test

-   T = (statistic-hypothesized value) / s.e.(statistic)
    - $\frac{\bar{X}-\mu0}{S/\sqrt{n}}$
